EmailTemplate.name: 02_09_2015 What is Control Video #2.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, Why Should You Control?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Why Do You Need Control? Think about it...you virtualized to save money, to do more with less and you've done just that. But now all of that innovation and advancement has led to an overflow of alerts and complexity. Now, continue to be that innovator and find out why you need control.
<http://vmturbo.com/blog/need-demand-driven-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=whiteboard_vid&utm_content=02_12_15> Your IT control system, VMTurbo 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
